meanings.sent1: She thought her new shoes were hip, but her friend's shoes were even hipper.
meanings.sent2: The jacket she wore was hip, but the one her sister wore was hipper.
meanings.sent3: The hip girl in school always wore the hipper accessories.
meanings.sent4: His taste in music was already hip, but after the concert, it became even hipper.
meanings.sent5: The hippest cat in town always knew the hipper spots to hang out.

meanings.definition: A person who is aware of or knowledgeable about the latest trends or fashions.
meanings.sent1: She became the hipper among her friends after attending the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: The hipper at the party was the one everyone turned to for style advice.
meanings.sent3: The hipper always knew the latest trends before anyone else.
meanings.sent4: Being the hipper in the group, she was always ahead of the fashion game.
meanings.sent5: The hipper in the office was known for always dressing impeccably.

meanings.definition: To make someone or something more hip or trendy.
meanings.sent1: She wanted to hipper up her wardrobe for the new season.
meanings.sent2: He decided to hipper his music playlist by adding some new tracks.
meanings.sent3: The stylist was hired to hipper up the celebrity's image for the event.
meanings.sent4: The makeover show aimed to hipper the contestants' style and confidence.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer's goal was to hipper the brand's image with the latest collection.
